item.title: 2022 Q1 Event Listing
item.description: 2022 Q1 Events Listing Unless noted otherwise, all event time is at GMT+8 (Beijing time). March, 2022 Date/Time Product Event Topics Call or recording 15:00, March 10th “DuoNB community catch-up call" Hosted on Zoom call Agenda > 15:00~15:10, Ice-breaking, introducing each other 15:10~16:00, Casual group sharing 16:00, End of call 14:00, March xxx “Bootstrapping DuoNB Web3 apps with ifanr Cloud" “如何利用知晓云开发 DuoNB Web3 移动应用” Hosted on Zoom call Agenda > 14:00~14:10, Ice-breaking, introducing each other 14:00~14:20, About ifanr Cloud / 知晓云简介，Ms Du, ifanr Cloud 14:20~14:45, Develop next gen mobile apps and IoT systems / 面向物联应用的小程序开发, Chance J.

item.title: Community Call How-to
item.description: As an early-stage tech alliance and community, DuoNB focuses on online calls and events on topics that can drive interests to potential product innovation by the DuoNB Principles. DuoNB Community Call is currently the primary activity moderated by community managers nominated from alliance members, to promote open sharing and discussion on the many aspects of business, products, technologies, and supply chain. DuoNB Community Calls can be jointly hosted with other friendly communities, such as UIH - Unbuntu Innovation Hub (Foshan), and can be hosted as either virtual or in-person meetups or both.
